name: Badshah (rapper)
description:
'''Aditya Prateek Singh'''{{Efn|Badshah has often referred to his full name as '''Aditya Prateek Singh Sisodiya'''; however, he confirmed that his name on passport does not have '''Sisodiya''' in a [[The Lallantop]] interview.<ref>{{Cite AV media |url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ed8baqfORYc |title=Badshah ने Yo Yo Honey Singh से लड़ाई, Mafia Mundeer, Brown Rang, Angreji Beat लिखने पर ये बतायाGITN |date=2024-09-07 |last=The Lallantop |access-date=2024-09-08 |via=YouTube}}</ref> His business filings also do not end with '''Sisodiya'''.<ref>{{Cite web |title=Director Master Info |url=https://www.mca.gov.in/content/mca/global/en/mca/master-data/MDS/director-master-info.html?DIN=mltazUZOY6r/N4NzunkBcw== |access-date=2024-09-08 |website=www.mca.gov.in}}</ref><ref>{{Cite web |title=ADITYA PRATEEK SINGH |url=https://www.indiafilings.com/search/aditya-prateek-singh-din-08022516 |website=IndiaFilings}}</ref> Wikipedia's introduction uses only the legal name.|name=n1}} (born 19 November 1984), better known by his stage name '''Badshah''', is an [[India|Indian]] [[Rapping|rapper]], [[Singing|singer]], [[songwriter]], [[record producer|music producer]], [[television personality]] and [[Businessperson|businessman]]. Badshah has recorded his songs in [[Hindi]], [[Punjabi language|Punjabi]], [[English language|English]] and [[Haryanvi language|Haryanvi]] languages.  

Badshah gained widespread recognition after his 2012 single, "Saturday Saturday", was featured in the soundtrack of the 2014 movie, ''[[Humpty Sharma Ki Dulhania]]''. His notable works in Bollywood films include "Abhi Toh Party Shuru Hui Hai" from [[Khoobsurat (2014 film)]], "Kar Gayi Chull" from [[Kapoor & Sons|''Kapoor and Sons'']], "Garmi" from ''[[Street Dancer 3D]]'', "Naina" from [[Crew (film)|''Crew'']], "Proper Patola" from ''[[Namaste England]]''. He has also collaborated with international artists such as [[J Balvin]] and [[Tainy]] for the song "Voodoo" with a guest verse from [[Lil Baby]].

Badshah has appeared as judge on [[MTV Hustle]], [[Indian Idol (Hindi TV series)|Indian Idol]], [[Dil Hai Hindustani]], [[India's Got Talent]], and [[India's Got Latent]].
